title: IS_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_BREAKABLE
content:
0x23E46BD7// IsHeliTailBoomBreakable
BOOL IS_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_BREAKABLE(Vehicle heli);Parameters:heli: The helicopter to checkReturns: Returns true if the helicopter's tail boom can break, false if it cannot.This is a getter for SET_HELI_TAIL_EXPLODE_THROW_DASHBOARD
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for IS_HELI_TAIL_BOOM_BREAKABLE
IsHeliTailBoomBreakable(vehicle)
